The user creates one or more humanoid shapes out of mud that carry out their bidding. Like [[sand clone]]s, the mud dolls can recover from most damage they receive. When a mud doll captures an opponent, it can force its hand down their throat, drowning them with mud.

[[pt-br:Estilo Lama: Boneco de Lama]]
[[pl:Deiton: Doro Ningyō]]
